sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap-v5' import ReactApexChart from "react-apexcharts"; import { chartData } from './ChartData' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { swapSetting } from './Action/action'; export default function CrossChain() { const [chainModal, setChainModal] = useState(false); const [name, setname] = useState('Regular'); const [order, setOrder] = useState('Trade Order'); const [slippageaction, setSlippageaction] = useState(false) const [selectedSlippage, setSelectedSlippage] = useState('0.5%'); const [walletModal, setWalletModal] = useState(false); const [MoreInfo, setMoreInfo] = useState(true); const [currency1Icon, setCurrency1Icon] = useState('bnb.png'); const [currency2Icon, setCurrency2Icon] = useState('8bitchain.png'); const [currency1, setCurrency1] = useState('BNB'); const [currency2, setCurrency2] = useState('w8Bit'); const [showsecurity, setShowSecurity] = useState(false); const [showcsecurity, setShowcSecurity] = useState(false); // const [slippageaction, setSlippageaction] = useState(true) const navigate = useNavigate(); const ActiveStore = useSelector((state) => state.SettingStore); const dispatch = useDispatch(); function Info() { return (

Market Info

24 Hour Volume : 1,00,000
24 Hour Change : +40%
24 Hour Transactions : 1000
Pair : BNB, Pancakeswap V2
Contract Address : 0x48f.D70

Security Info

{ showsecurity ?
: null }
{ showcsecurity ?
: null }
) } const series = [ { data: chartData, }, ]; const SwapCurrency = () => { const temp = currency1; setCurrency1(currency2); setCurrency2(temp); const iconTemp = currency1Icon; setCurrency1Icon(currency2Icon); setCurrency2Icon(iconTemp) } return (
{/* Chart Section */}
{/*
*/}
{ ActiveStore == "info" ? :
Swap your assets at different chains
0
~$1,846
{/* */}
0
~$1,846
{ slippageaction ?
{ setSelectedSlippage(e.target.value + '%') }} type="text" placeholder='Manual' />
: null }
{/*
*/}
{ MoreInfo ? <>
Minimum Received -
Estimated Processing Time -
Price Impact -
Gas Fee - {/* */}
: null }
}
{ setChainModal(false) }} fullscreen={false} centered >
ETH w8Bit
{ setWalletModal(false) }} fullscreen={false} centered >

Connect Your Wallet

) }
